channel.title: [517] How can i get Xp on combat [517]
channel.description: Well Grunkscape got a system: at quest tab have toggle xp button . This button make the player get experience when is fighting, if is not pressed this button it doenst level up. My source is Abbyscap3 witch is better but the problem is Xp rate or this togglexp button. How can i get xp when im fighting ? where i should look and change xp rate or something like that? So my problem is this ----> I dont get experience when i attack NPC`s. Please help! Ty

item.title: [517] How can i get Xp on combat [517]
item.dc:creator: @Ownz_Asul Ownz Asul
item.description:
@Ownz_Asul wrote:

Well Grunkscape got a system: at quest tab have toggle xp button . This button make the player get experience when is fighting, if is not pressed this button it doenst level up.
My source is Abbyscap3 witch is better but the problem is Xp rate or this togglexp button.
How can i get xp when im fighting ? where i should look and change xp rate or something like that?
So my problem is this ----> I dont get experience when i attack NPC`s.
Please help!
Ty
